item.title: Host a static Ghost blog on GitHub using Buster
item.description: I have really enjoyed the simplicity of the [Ghost](https://github.com/tryghost/Ghost” target=”_blank) blogging system and wanted to use it for my personal site. But I also enjoyed the ease of hosting with [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com” target=”_blank) so I needed to find a way to generate a static version of a Ghost blog. Luckily someone already had a handy little tool for the job called [Buster](https://github.com/axitkhurana/buster” target=”_blank). Installing Buster Details on Buster can be found [here](https://github.
